strategies.finalAnswer:
Final Rollout Handoff Note – Mobile App v4 Rollout (Agent B)

Date: April 18, 2026
Region: eu-central
Crash-free gate: ≥ 99.7%

Rollout plan
- Phased rollout in eu-central using feature flags:
  - Phase 1: Canary 1%
  - Phase 2: 5%
  - Phase 3: 25%
  - Phase 4: 50%
  - Phase 5: 100%
- Each phase validated against the gate condition before progressing

Gate and validation
- Crash-free rate definition: (Sessions - Crashes) / Sessions
- Measurement window: rolling 24 hours post-release for each phase
- Data sources: telemetry/crash analytics
- Escalation: if crash-free rate < 99.7% in any phase, halt rollout and trigger rollback

Pre-release readiness
- Instrumentation and feature flags enabled in eu-central
- Health dashboards and alerts wired (crash counts, sessions, latency, errors)
- Pre-release QA complete; smoke tests passed in EU region

Rollback plan
- Trigger conditions: failure to meet gate in any phase
- Rollback steps: revert to v3; re-point traffic away from v4; verify stability post-rollback
- Notify stakeholders and stakeholders’ on-call rotations

Roles and responsibilities (Agent B)
- Monitor phase progression and gate status in eu-central
- Enforce rollout gates; pause/rollback if gate breach occurs
- Coordinate with SRE/Eng Lead for incident response
- Maintain and update runbooks, dashboards, and communications

Deliverables for Agent B
- [ ] Confirm eu-central readiness and region routing
- [ ] Enable and test feature flags for phased rollout
- [ ] Set up and verify crash-free dashboards and alerts
- [ ] Prepare rollback/runbook and communication templates
- [ ] Create or update stakeholder contact list and status updates
- [ ] Schedule regular check-ins during each phase

Key contacts
- On-call SRE and Eng Lead: [names/contacts to be filled]
- Product/PM: [name/contact]
- Support/Customer Ops: [name/contact]

Notes
- If any phase gate is not passed within defined window, pause progression and execute rollback per runbook.

Handoff Note: Mobile App v4 Rollout – Agent B

Target/Region/Gate
- Target date: April 18
- Rollout region: eu-central
- Gate criterion: crash-free rate >= 99.7% (EU) post-release
